attributes.action: Ban all animal cruelty videos from being posted and shared on Facebook
attributes.additional_details:
We are well aware of what goes on with sick individuals who think it is ok to abuse animals but we don't need to see it on a daily basis.
 For example, the dog meat trade in Thailand/China etc . We do not need to watch a video of a dog being tortured and screaming for help. This does not raise awareness it just makes me mad/angry/upset and left feeling so low. It really needs to stop!! Please sign and join me to get Facebook to take action, it's about time!!
attributes.background: I don't know about you but when I log into Facebook I see a lot of disgusting, cruel videos involving animals being posted and shared. It is really upsetting and not something I want to see on a daily basis. Facebook needs to ban these videos!!

rejection.details: This petition is calling on Facebook, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.
